SELECT r.userId, r.spaceId,r.reservationDate, r.startTime, r.endTime, r.purpose, r.memo, r.regdate,s.name as spaceName, u.name as person, u.email as email FROM hguclub.reservationInfo as r
LEFT JOIN hguclub.user as u ON r.userId = u.id RIGHT OUTER JOIN hguclub.space as s ON r.spaceId = s.id
